June 9, 1924 D Southern Counties Association Contest (3rd Section)
Southern Counties Association Contest (3rd Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Southern Counties Association Contest southern-counties-association-contest-3rd-section
None
Woodland Revels
Football Ground, Horsham, Sussex First prize, £6.10s. and the “Denton” Challenge Cup; 2nd £5; 3rd £3.10s; 4th £2.
SPECIAL PRIZES Trombone soloist (trombone presented by Messrs Besson and Co Ltd., value £9.9s), Turner’s Hill. Soprano medal, Banstead; solo cornet medal, Ewell; and euphonium medal, Lewes Town.
June 20, 2014, 2:38 p.m. June 20, 2014, 3:23 p.m.
1 Epsom & Ewell Silver Band Harry Cave
2 Lewes Town Arthur King Tappin
3 Oxted G. W. Poynter
4 West Hoathly Arthur Francis
5 Turners Hill and Worth W. H. Botting
6 Ewell and District Boys A. J. Darnell
